item.title: Jayalalithaa slams BJP over fishermen issue
item.description: Charging the BJP with adopting doublestandards on the fishermen issue AIADMK supremo and Tamil Nadu chief minister Jayalalithaa said on Sunday voting for the national party will not benefit the people of her state
item.itunes:subtitle: Charging the BJP with adopting doublestandards on the fishermen issue AIADMK supremo and Tamil Nadu chief minister Jayalalithaa said on Sunday voting for the national party will not benefit the people of her state
item.itunes:summary: Charging the BJP with adopting doublestandards on the fishermen issue AIADMK supremo and Tamil Nadu chief minister Jayalalithaa said on Sunday voting for the national party will not benefit the people of her state

item.title: Teacher kills self after fined Rs 1 lakh by kangaroo court
item.description: A teacher committed suicide after being ridiculed at a village reconciliation meeting and asked to pay Rs one lakh for allegedly having illicit relations with a married woman at Sagardighi in Murshidabad district on Sunday
item.itunes:subtitle: A teacher committed suicide after being ridiculed at a village reconciliation meeting and asked to pay Rs one lakh for allegedly having illicit relations with a married woman at Sagardighi in Murshidabad district on Sunday
item.itunes:summary: A teacher committed suicide after being ridiculed at a village reconciliation meeting and asked to pay Rs one lakh for allegedly having illicit relations with a married woman at Sagardighi in Murshidabad district on Sunday

item.title: Crack the whip on Indians joining ISIS Centre may tell NIA
item.description: With security agencies identifying 22 radicalised youth leaving India in response to the jihadist call of the ISIS the government may ask the NIA to file an FIR against unknown persons affiliated to the organisation
item.itunes:subtitle: With security agencies identifying 22 radicalised youth leaving India in response to the jihadist call of the ISIS the government may ask the NIA to file an FIR against unknown persons affiliated to the organisation
item.itunes:summary: With security agencies identifying 22 radicalised youth leaving India in response to the jihadist call of the ISIS the government may ask the NIA to file an FIR against unknown persons affiliated to the organisation

item.title: Manmohan refuses to comment on Rais charges
item.description: Former PM Manmohan Singh who is under fire from the former CAG Vinod Rai over the 2G spectrum scam and Coalgate said on Sunday he had done his duty and refused to respond to charges levelled against him
item.itunes:subtitle: Former PM Manmohan Singh who is under fire from the former CAG Vinod Rai over the 2G spectrum scam and Coalgate said on Sunday he had done his duty and refused to respond to charges levelled against him
item.itunes:summary: Former PM Manmohan Singh who is under fire from the former CAG Vinod Rai over the 2G spectrum scam and Coalgate said on Sunday he had done his duty and refused to respond to charges levelled against him

item.title: Dikshit slams NDA for nudging UPAappointed guvs
item.description: Attacking the NDA government for forcing UPAappointed governors to quit former Kerala governor and threetime Delhi chief minister Sheila Dikshit on Sunday said the new dispensation targeted the holders of the constitutional office selectively
item.itunes:subtitle: Attacking the NDA government for forcing UPAappointed governors to quit former Kerala governor and threetime Delhi chief minister Sheila Dikshit on Sunday said the new dispensation targeted the holders of the constitutional office selectively
item.itunes:summary: Attacking the NDA government for forcing UPAappointed governors to quit former Kerala governor and threetime Delhi chief minister Sheila Dikshit on Sunday said the new dispensation targeted the holders of the constitutional office selectively

item.title: After Maharashtra BJP faces ally trouble in Bihar
item.description: After the Shiv Sena in Maharashtra and the HJC in Haryana the BJP now has to contend with an ally in Bihar a junior one offering himself as the NDAs chief ministerial candidate for the state assembly elections next year

item.title: Easier faster child adoption process on the cards
item.description: A fresh set of guidelines drafted by the women and child development WCD ministry is set to make adoption simpler and quicker

item.title: Top Chinese leaders coming to India with Xi
item.description: Chinese president Xi Jinping will be accompanied by two important members of the politburo of the ruling Communist Party of China CPC Wang Huning and Li Zhanshu during his visit to India

item.title: Ignou shuts down skill dev govt asks it for roadmap
item.description: The Human Resources Development HRD ministry has asked Indira Gandhi National Open University Ignou to draw a roadmap for a yearly intake of 5 lakh students for skill development training

item.title: 5 institutes find place in new wildlife board
item.description: The environment ministry has notified the new board for wildlife headed by Prime Minister Narendra Modi Not a single wildlife expert from the previous wildlife committee has been nominated in the board which finds dominance of forest officials from Gujarat

item.title: Fresh fear rains on Valley
item.description: Cloudy conditions and rain returned to flooddevastated Srinagar on Sunday morning setting off panic among people and worrying officials The clouds cleared later but the regions topmost army officer told HT that heavy rainfall in Kupwara posed a risk to Baramulla a large town north of Srinagar
item.itunes:subtitle: Cloudy conditions and rain returned to flooddevastated Srinagar on Sunday morning setting off panic among people and worrying officials The clouds cleared later but the regions topmost army officer told HT that heavy rainfall in Kupwara posed a risk to Ba
item.itunes:summary: Cloudy conditions and rain returned to flooddevastated Srinagar on Sunday morning setting off panic among people and worrying officials The clouds cleared later but the regions topmost army officer told HT that heavy rainfall in Kupwara posed a risk to Baramulla a large town north of Srinagar

item.title: JK Omar govt takes charge of relief operations
item.description: The Omar Abdullah government is now taking charge of the relief operations in Jammu and Kashmir Meanwhile the Union health ministry proposes to mobilise boats to send medical supplies to the people trapped in the submerged areas of Srinagar and are finding it impossible to venture out of their houses
item.itunes:subtitle: The Omar Abdullah government is now taking charge of the relief operations in Jammu and Kashmir Meanwhile the Union health ministry proposes to mobilise boats to send medical supplies to the people trapped in the submerged areas of Srinagar and are findin
item.itunes:summary: The Omar Abdullah government is now taking charge of the relief operations in Jammu and Kashmir Meanwhile the Union health ministry proposes to mobilise boats to send medical supplies to the people trapped in the submerged areas of Srinagar and are finding it impossible to venture out of their houses

item.title: Madrasas imparting terror education says BJP MP
item.description: In controversial remarks BJP MP Sakshi Maharaj on Sunday alleged that madarsas were giving education of terrorism He alleged that students were not being taught about nationalism in the religious schools
item.itunes:subtitle: In controversial remarks BJP MP Sakshi Maharaj on Sunday alleged that madarsas were giving education of terrorism He alleged that students were not being taught about nationalism in the religious schools
item.itunes:summary: In controversial remarks BJP MP Sakshi Maharaj on Sunday alleged that madarsas were giving education of terrorism He alleged that students were not being taught about nationalism in the religious schools

item.title: Donations for JK is my bday present says Modi
item.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi who turns 64 on September 17 has appealed to friends and wellwishers to refrain from celebrating and instead donate towards the Jammu and Kashmir flood victims

item.title: Varanasi set to get grand makeover film city
item.description: The Union urban development ministry has drawn up a blueprint for a slew of projects comprising town planning civic and transportation to reshape the temple town significantly
item.itunes:subtitle: The Union urban development ministry has drawn up a blueprint for a slew of projects comprising town planning civic and transportation to reshape the temple town significantly
item.itunes:summary: The Union urban development ministry has drawn up a blueprint for a slew of projects comprising town planning civic and transportation to reshape the temple town significantly
